p: Secondly, most pharmacological studies have only used a simple animal model, without further study of potential mechanisms of action, such as involved receptors or intercellular and intracellular pathways. In addition, the results of some methods used in animal research are not reliable due to the lack of the positive control group; in some studies, the lack of dose effect analysis has important limitations, and the application of dose needs further research to determine the optimal effective and safe dosage.
